title: Bystanders punch and kick masked thug on floor as he flees jewellery store raid
text:

Bystanders punched and kicked a masked thug on the floor after an alleged armed robbery.

In this video, shot in Shepherd's Bush, west London, three masked men are seen sprinting down the street away from a jewellery shop.

Lagging behind, one of the trio falls into the pavement where a group of bystanders are seen punching and kicking him.

The thugs had rammed a car into the shop's glass frontage to gain entrance.

As the video of robbery comes to an end, a man outside the shop wearing a black hoodie and black trousers can be heard yelling at the three robbers while another man with a grey hoodie attempts to pull him back.

(Image: @yay6yay/Twitter)

As the thugs wearing bike helmets flee the shop, one of them raises a weapon towards the man, who is forced to move back.

One of the raiders exits the shop clutching a bag and threatens the crowd with what appears to be a sledgehammer, reports the Daily Express .

(Image: @yay6yay/Twitter)

(Image: @yay6yay/Twitter)

But as two of the robbers manage to flee the third loses his footing and is swamped by the angry bystanders.

Met Police have confirmed an incident took place at the shop around 5pm today.

Three police officers arrive at the end of the video, as the robber is still being held down.

(Image: @yay6yay/Twitter)

A Met Police spokesman said: “Police were called at 17:21hrs on Friday, 25 October to Uxbridge Road W12 after a car was reportedly driven into the shop front of a jewellery store before the occupants got out and began trying to steal goods.

“Officers attended. One male [age unknown] has been arrested on suspicion of robbery.

“Enquiries are ongoing to locate at least two other suspects who fled the scene.

“A crime scene is in place. Enquires continue.”
description: Shocking footage captured in Shepherd's Bush, west London, shows the robber being pummelled after falling to the floor while trying to flee
